page.title: 02BROADFORD SURGERY
page.content: {The Broadford Surgery}has two doctors, Doctor A.W.Humphrey and Doctor R.M.Thompson and also a trainee G.P. The surgery has five rooms.These are the waiting room, medicines room, reception area,and two consulting rooms.Both doctors work full time during the day and work alternate nights.The facilities available are postnatal clinic,vaccination clinic and,consulation with either of the G.P.s. The busiest time of the year is in the summer when visitors from all over the world pass through Broadford. There are approximately 1500 patients on the practice's files.The practice comes under the administrative area of the Highland Health Board in Inverness.The surgery is situated at {Cairn Villa,Corry,Broadford. {
